byline.contributor: Saba Imtiaz and Zia ur-Rehman contributed reporting from Karachi, Pakistan, and Waqar Gillani from Islamabad.

lead_paragraph: Security forces were put on high alert in major cities across the country after the hanging of Malik Mumtaz Hussain Qadri, who killed Salmaan Taseer, an advocate for changes in blasphemy laws.

headline.print_headline: Fears of Unrest as Pakistan Executes High-Profile Killer
headline.main: Pakistan Braces for Violence After Execution of Governor’s Killer

snippet: Security forces were put on high alert in major cities across the country after the hanging of Malik Mumtaz Hussain Qadri, who killed Salmaan Taseer, an advocate for changes in blasphemy laws.
abstract: Pakistani authorities prepare for violent backlash after execution of man who assassinated provincial governor for promoting relaxation of blasphemy laws; Malik Mumtaz Hussain Qadri is celebrated as martyr by large swath of Pakistani society which supports blasphemy laws.
